snippet: A Chinese graduate student at the University of Southern California in Los Angeles has been found dead in his off-campus apartment after being assaulted late at night on his way home, police and university officials said....

headline.print_headline: Chinese Grad Student Found Beaten to Death Near USC Campus
headline.main: Chinese Grad Student Found Beaten to Death Near USC Campus

lead_paragraph: A Chinese graduate student at the University of Southern California in Los Angeles has been found dead in his off-campus apartment after being assaulted late at night on his way home, police and university officials said.
